name: 绝影-Vanishing Shadow
description:
Game content



Play as 12 characters, switch between each other in place, and experience a high degree of freedom of gameplay. Ride horses and bicycles, drive sports cars and helicopters to stay up late in beautiful nature.

Game Character Introduction:

Game Character Introduction:
Mountain Biking: With silky action and cool stunts, switch to first-person for a realistic ride.
Sports car: engine, sound effects, appearance reference to the actual sports car, acceleration turning brakes, let you experience that this is a man's dream, sports car can be customized and customized, tires and vehicles, lighting color can be adjusted, there are third-person and first-person perspectives.
Drone: first control the technical person, control the drone through the person, the drone flight is very natural, you can also take high-resolution photos, while saving to the local, up to 4K resolution.
White Horse "Peerless Shadow": White Horse as Golden Bond, Lian Pian Northwest.
Pegasus: Add wings to the white horse and experience a romantic flight in the colorful nature.
Swim Girl: Sexy bikini beauty with breaststroke freestyle mode and diving stunts.
Delta wing paraglider: The glider wing moves relative to the air, and lift and drag are generated on the wing, which can carry people into the air for gliding flight.
Backpack Flight: Human flight is achieved through the principle of recoil, and there are nearly ten types in the game.
Sci-fi robot: a jump is 20 meters high, with a grappling hook system, full of technology.
Horse Boy: The character is a handsome boy in ancient China.
Off-road vehicle: how can it be missing in such a colorful nature?

Game technology and details:


The game contains six different maps, each with a different style, with city parks and canyon forests using high-resolution materials and multiple vegetation, and highly realistic scenes through Unreal 5Lumen and Nanite technology. There is a complete weather system in the city park, rain, snow, cloudy and sunny, and there is standing water on the ground when it rains, and the bits and pieces are very realistic. When it snows, driving and riding a horse leaves a mark. Spring forest map, bright and eye-catching, with a complete cycle of day and night, you can watch sunrise and sunset.
The game supports hardware and software ray tracing, DLSS, Lumen global illumination, plane reflections, and more. These can be debugged according to your own configuration in the Chinese menu.
